reviews.review: Finally someone dies in the MCU

Épico de todos os filmes de herói, sendo o mais impactante da Marvel, não tão perfeito em termos técnicos e narrativos pois são muitos personagens, manter o equilíbrio dos núcleos foi a principal dificuldade do longa e decerta forma não foi vencida totalmente. Com tudo isto é um detalhe que passa despercebido para os leigos tendo o fato de que os personagens do núcleo menos favorecido já foram desenvolvidos nos filmes anteriores na Marvel. Thanos é oficialmente o melhor vilão da Marvel tendo uma série de camadas  e nuances meticulosamente desenvolvidas que fazem o cinespectador compreender toda a sua linha de raciocínio até um dado objetivo.
As sequências de lutas são espetaculares, o CGI é bem trabalhado, principalmente o do Thanos, que está impecável, e os ambientes favorecem para a construção da narrativa no que tange aos aspectos visuais da fotografia.
A história não é complexa, é simples, porém bem executada de modo que seja rápida mas que nunca perde o controle, o filme mesmo sendo rápido não tem pressa em apresentar a proposta.
Vingadores: Guerra Infinita merece todo o nosso respeito pela sua ousadia e coragem que o fazem tornar memorável e inesquecível para quem aprecia e usufrui do universo dos heróis. 
Nota: 4,5/5
It is just truly breathtaking, I don't know why some critics gave it bad reviews. It is way better than Black Panther
Epic, non stop action, Chris Pratt and Robert Downey Jr together are hilarious. Great bounce back from the mediocrity of black panther. can't wait for avengers 4!
The pinnacle of the MCU in every sense of the word.

The movie isn't a typical MCU movie but it adds something that lacks in other MCU movies. That is a great villain with a backstory and motive that makes sense. Plot wise it's great and does a great job of having all of the characters and their personalities mix to make a great film. But there are some spots where characters seem different but doesn't make the movies any less than what it's is. Infinity war was incredibly enjoyable with good laughs and awesome action with the characters you want to see.
Once in a lifetime experience. Only thing I didn't like was Thanos' henchmen weren't as strong as they should have been. IMAX 3d was amazing.

This was incredible. You will leave shocked and contemplating life. I recommend watching it as soon as possible to avoid spoilers because these spoilers are 110% worth it and if any 1 of them get ruined, you are going to be mad. This also recommends multiple viewings. GO GO GO NOW and watch it.
Does not follow comics and is missing major heroes that help to defeat Thanos.

Filled with grand spectacle on a whole new level, Avengers: Infinity War delivers on all the characters we know and love. The story is more than occasionally overshadowed by the mind-blowing action, but it’s a heck of a ride. And a gutsy ending sealed the deal. The action is non-stop, nearly to an overwhelming degree, but it’s gripping throughout. Thanos makes for a thrilling villain, not only uber-powerful, but written with depth. As with most “part ones,” it’s not fully satisfying, but makes me pumped for the next one.
